name: Welding In The Deep
description:
Welding in the Deep is a light puzzle, atmospheric exploration where you are tasked with repairing the oil pipeline down beneath the depths, all while maintaining the safety of the environment - making sure that no oil leaks happen and that all pipes and structures remain well secured. Apart from that, you may also take into consideration, should you spare some time, to clean up the man-made waste in the seafloor that has accumulated throughout the years and has been affecting marine life.

Developers: Consonauts (Matthew Belen, Jacob Esclamado, Renzo Romano, Russell Melendrez, Bennedict Soliman)

This game was made in compliance with our Thesis 2 within a 14 week deadline.
